items.sentence: Tom has always maintained that he is innocent, and claims to this day that he was framed.
I recently learned that the people I thought were my real parents aren't my real parents.
Tom waited at the bus stop for over an hour, unaware that the bus drivers were on strike.
I realize this may sound crazy, but I think I've fallen in love with your younger sister.
My mother makes my bed every day after I leave for school. I make my own bed on weekends.
